page.title: 15A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: I get up at 9 a.m. I get washed and dressed and then get my breakfast which is usually rice crispies. At 10 a.m. I go to Mass, then I go to a coffee morning at the Crescent centre where the warden lives. It runs from 10 a.m. to 12 noon. That's when I have my dinner, I have a little snack like a couple of sandwiches and some milk. After dinner I go up my gran's to see if my cousins are there. At 1 p.m. I take my dog for a walk to the "rec." At 1.30 p.m. I read or draw for an hour. At 2.30 there is usually a film so I watch that for an hour. At 3.30 I usually make a dessert for tea. At 4.00 my Mam's friends come for a tea. We use the good crockery. After that I draw or read for an hour. At six I take the dog for a walk. At 6.30 I watch T.V. until bedtime.
